title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid username, email, and password.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/register with valid username, valid email, and valid password.
Check that the response status code is 200 and registration is successful.

title: User Registration Validation Error
description: Verify that registration fails with invalid email and missing required fields.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/register with invalid email and missing password.
Check that the response status code is 400 with appropriate validation error messages.

title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a registered user can log in successfully with username or email and correct password.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/login with correct username/email and password.
Check that the response status code is 200 and login is successful with session established.

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails when incorrect username/email or password is provided.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/login with invalid username/email or wrong password.
Check that the response status code is 401 with invalid credentials message.

title: User Logout Success
description: Verify that a logged-in user can log out successfully.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/logout with valid session authentication.
Check that the response status code is 200 and session is invalidated.

title: Perform Calculation with Valid Parameters
description: Verify that the calculator API returns correct results for valid calculation requests across different calculator types.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/calculate with 'calculator' parameter set to 'CivilCalculator' and a valid parameters object.
Check that the response status code is 200 and returned calculation result matches expected value.
Repeat for 'ElectricalCalculator', 'HVACCalculator', 'PlumbingCalculator', and 'TraditionalUnitsCalculator'.
Verify responses are correctly formatted and calculations accurate.

title: Perform Calculation with Invalid Parameters
description: Verify the calculation API returns validation errors for missing or invalid input parameters.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/calculate with missing 'calculator' parameter.
Check that response status code is 400 with an invalid parameter error.
Send POST request to /api/calculate with invalid or incomplete parameters object.
Check that response status code is 400 and error message describes input issue.

title: Admin Dashboard Statistics Retrieval
description: Verify that admin users can retrieve dashboard statistics successfully.

steps.description: Send authorized GET request to /api/admin/dashboard/stats.
Check response status is 200 with valid statistics data structure.

title: Calculation History Retrieval
description: Verify that users can retrieve their calculation history correctly.

steps.description: Send authenticated GET request to /api/calculations.
Verify response returns 200 status with a list of calculations belonging to the user.

title: Calculation History Export in Multiple Formats
description: Verify users can export their calculation history in supported formats (e.g., CSV, PDF).

steps.description: Initiate export request in CSV format via relevant API or export controller.
Ensure response is a file download with correctly formatted CSV content.
Repeat export request for PDF format.
Verify PDF file is generated and downloadable with correct calculation data.

title: Payment Processing with Stripe Success
description: Verify payment processing and subscription management using Stripe completes successfully.

steps.description: Send payment initiation request via PaymentController with valid Stripe payment details.
Check that payment succeeds and subscription is activated.

title: Payment Processing with PayTM Success
description: Verify payment processing and subscription management using PayTM completes successfully.

steps.description: Send payment initiation request via PaymentController with valid PayTM payment details.
Confirm payment completes successfully and subscription is updated.

title: Database CRUD Operations
description: Verify Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations on key database entities maintain consistency and enforce constraints.

steps.description: Create new user record via API or service layer.
Check that record is successfully stored in MySQL database.
Update user profile fields using API or service methods.
Verify updates persist and constraints (e.g., unique email) enforced.
Delete test user record.
Confirm record removal and database consistency.

title: Database Migration Handling
description: Verify database schema migrations apply correctly without data loss or corruption.

steps.description: Apply pending migrations to test database environment.
Confirm schema updates are reflected properly and existing data remains intact.

title: Authentication Authorization Enforcement
description: Ensure endpoints enforce authentication and role-based authorization preventing unauthorized access.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected API endpoints without authentication.
Verify response status code is 401 Unauthorized.
Access admin-only APIs with authenticated non-admin user.
Confirm response is 403 Forbidden.

title: CSRF Protection Verification
description: Verify that CSRF tokens are required and validated on state-changing requests.

steps.description: Send POST request to sensitive endpoints without CSRF token.
Response should be rejected with appropriate CSRF validation error.
Send POST request with valid CSRF token.
Request should succeed.

title: Input Validation Against XSS and SQL Injection
description: Verify that inputs are sanitized to prevent XSS and SQL injection attacks.

steps.description: Submit input containing typical XSS payloads in form fields.
Verify input is sanitized and no script executes or is stored.
Submit input containing SQL injection patterns.
Verify queries are parameterized and injection is prevented.

title: Rate Limiting Enforcement
description: Verify that API rate limits are enforced to prevent abuse.

steps.description: Send rapid consecutive requests exceeding rate limit thresholds.
Check that subsequent requests are rejected with HTTP 429 Too Many Requests.

title: Third-Party Email Notification Success
description: Verify email notifications are sent correctly through configured SMTP service.

steps.description: Trigger notification sending via notification system.
Verify email delivery success and content correctness.

title: System Health Check Endpoint
description: Verify that the system health check endpoint returns healthy status.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/health.
Confirm response status code is 200 with 'System healthy' message.

title: Performance Test: API Response Time Under 500ms
description: Verify that key API endpoints respond within the 500ms performance benchmark under normal load.

steps.description: Send requests to critical API endpoints and measure response times.
Ensure all responses complete within 500ms.

title: Load Test: Concurrent Users Handling
description: Simulate multiple concurrent users performing typical workflows and verify system stability and response times.

steps.description: Simulate concurrent user sessions performing login, calculations, and payment processing.
Verify system maintains response times under threshold and does not crash.
